vertical.description: Pressure levels and height vary by parameter: Percentiles for temperature are available at 850 hPa and 1.5m; Probability of wind speed is available at 10m; Percentiles for wind speed are available at 850 and 250 hPa, also at 10m; Probability of/Percentiles for wind gust are available at 10m; Ensemble mean and spread (standard deviation) of geopotential height is available at 500 hPa; Percentiles for magnitude of wind shear is calculated as vector differences between 250 hPa and 850 hPa, and between 700 hPa and 925 hPa; Probability of total precipitation, Percentiles for total precipitation, Percentile for CAPE, Percentile for total cloud cover, and Ensemble mean and spread (standard deviation) of mean sea-level pressure (MSLP) are available at surface level.

probabilistic.description: Includes probability for: Total precipitation (surface level): thresholds of 1, 5, 10, 25, 50, and 100 mm over 24 hours; 1, 5, 10, 25, and 50 mm over 6 hours; Wind speed (10 m): thresholds of 10, 15, 20, and 25 m/s; Wind gust (10 m): thresholds of 15, 25, and 35 m/s.

percentiles.description: Includes percentile for:Total precipitation (surface): 25th, 50th, 75th, maximum; Total solid precipitation (surface): 25th, 50th, 75th, maximum; Temperature (2 m, 850 hPa): min, 25th, 50th, 75th, maximum; Wind speed (10 m, 850 hPa, 250 hPa): min, 25th, 50th, 75th, maximum; Wind gust (10 m): min, 25th, 50th, maximum; CAPE (surface): 25th, 50th, 75th, maximum; Wind shear magnitude (vector difference between 250 hPa and 850 hPa, and between 700 hPa and 925 hPa): 25th, 50th, 75th, maximum; Total cloud cover (surface): min, 25th, 50th, 75th, maximum.

temporal.description: Forecast runs occur twice daily at times T00Z and T12Z. Each run covers 10 days (240 hours), with 3-hourly steps up to 72 hours and 6-hourly steps thereafter.

properties.title: Met Office Global Ensemble NWP
properties.description: Met Office medium-range global ensemble forecast. 0.5-degree x 0.5-degree regular lat./lon. grid; forecast range up to 240h; time steps every 3hrs up to 72h, then every 6hrs; runs 00/12 UTC; various parameters, various levels, and various thresholds.

concepts.title: ukmo:dataType
concepts.description: Predictions and Post Processed data are defined as data that infers a full coverage of the state of the physical, chemical and/or biological environment within a given domain and specific context. This includes data assimilation analysis, projections and predictions to different times and post processed outputs derived from predictions. Data are produced using automated production typically in large volumes controlled by algorithms and data science. Prediction data can take many forms, but they always have a Geospatial Feature, Coverage or native grids on creation. They may be packaged differently for supply for customer requirement.

properties.rights: Users are granted free and unrestricted access to this data, without charge and with no conditions on use. Users are requested to attribute the producer of this data. WMO Unified Data Policy (Resolution 1 (Cg-Ext 2021)).
